Player History
Injured on 9/10/1982 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1987, hitting .464 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 4/1/1988...
Drove in 6 runs against Columbus on 5/31/1988...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/20/1989, off Eddie Everett (PIL)...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/13/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $3,006,500 per year...
Traded from Malibu to Plum Grove on 5/17/1990 (Going to PG: LF F. Arana. Going to Mal: P J. Smith, P M. Daniel)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1990, hitting .611 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
